oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup Aired Performance - 1946-07-13 - KOMA - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on July 13, 1946 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Hiram Higsby (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), and Kenyon Brown (producer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Lem Hawkins; Dick Reinhart; Hiram Higsby; Chuck Davis; Prairie Songbirds; Mary lou; Roundup Boys
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Lem Hawkins plays an unidentified song / (1:44) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (2:04) Dick Reinhart performs "Little Toy Pistol Cowboy" / (4:34) Hiram Higsby and Lem Hawkins talk then perform "Barnacle Bill The Sailor" / (7:27) Chuck Davis performs a nursery rhyme which leads Hiram Higsby telling a children’s story / (8:45) The Prairie Songbirds perform "Little Green Valley" / (10:38) Hiram Higsby introduces the next song / (10:50) Dick Reinhart and Mary Lou perform "Farther Along" / (12:43) Chuck Davis and the Roundup Boys perform the closing theme which leads into the closing statements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); CBS Inc.; Reinhart, Dick; Higsby, Hiram, 1909-1975; Davis, Chuck;
